SELECT ei.id, ei.CODE, ei.NAME, ei.user_id, ei.content, ei.create_date, ui.NAME AS userName, ui.images AS userImages, count(ed.id) FROM event_info ei LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON (ui.id = ei.user_id) LEFT JOIN event_detail ed ON (ed.event_id = ei.id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ei.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{eventInfo.name},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{eventInfo.userName},'%')
GROUP BY ed.event_id ORDER BY ei.create_date DESC

SELECT ed.id, ed.device_id AS deviceId, ed.open_flag, ed.event_id, di.NAME AS name, di.address, di.remark, dt.id as typeId, dt.NAME AS typeName, dt.images FROM event_detail ed LEFT JOIN device_info di ON (di.id = ed.device_id) LEFT JOIN device_type dt ON (dt.id = di.type_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ed.event_id = #{eventId}
